marklogic.body: I feel as if they different around us more than we do with them. So I guess I can be the first person on here to say I do. They associate some of us with a little more personality than others as being "too black" or what is it they call it, oh yeah, "ghetto". I know how to conduct myself in a respectful manner as well. But I feel like thats just part of our culture. Whether its in church, or at Old School BBQ Spot Off 6th street. I don't think we should change who we are around them, but were the ones more at risk for be judged for whatever we do. I also feel like sometimes people in our own community can be our worst enemies when it comes to topics like this.
